{"id":1132664499,"question_id":3266,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1703991845,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"97 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1132664499/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Longest Special Substring That Occurs Thrice II","memory":"46.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumLength(String s) {\n        // 1. n+2\n        // 2. n+1, n\n        // 3. n n n \n        \n        \n        HashMap<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n            \n        int ed=0;\n        for(int st=0; st<s.length(); st++){\n            \n            while(ed<s.length() && s.charAt(ed)==s.charAt(st))\n                ed++;\n            \n             // System.out.println(st + \" \" +ed);\n            String sub = s.substring(st, ed);\n            \n           \n            map.put(sub, map.getOrDefault(sub,0)+1);\n            \n            st=ed-1;\n        }\n        \n        \n        int max= 0;\n        for(String k : map.keySet()){\n            int cnt = map.get(k);\n            \n            if(cnt>=3)\n                max = Math.max(max, k.length());\n            \n            if(map.getOrDefault(k.substring(1), 0)>=1 || cnt>=2)\n                max = Math.max(max, k.length()-1);\n            \n            if(k.length()>=3)\n                max = Math.max(max, k.length()-2);\n        }\n        \n        return max==0 ? -1 : max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-longest-special-substring-that-occurs-thrice-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
